decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title(s) - Proposed Floor Plans drawing no.ST_MAR23_72 ADE_03 Rev H, Proposed Side elevation and Section A-A Plans drawing no.ST_MAR23_72 ADE_05 Rev H and Proposed Section & Loft Plans drawing no.ST_MAR23_72 ADE_026 Rev H
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.

| The hereby approved three (3) rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby approved development shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the  area in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.18).
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policy DAA of Ealing's local Plan (Reg.18), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment, revision or new Order) no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.18), Polices D1 and D3 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Rear roof extension, rear outrigger roof extension and installation of three rooflights to front roofslope
